Author: Dbakskf
Text: Thank you so much for your reply, that was genuinely heart warming  And exactly the word I forgot to use, it's the implication and what a person without an ED will never understand and think we're crazy because they think it's helping  I wanted to ask if you don't mind, how did you cope with what you went through? It feels like I have so many problems and negatively already running through my head that I can't stop feeling beat-down and angry

Author: damnitjanet6
Text: Ahh no it wasn’t embarrassing- I’d freak out in your place too. I feel you. It’s the implication that’s hurt you, even though it wasn’t her intention.  I think you’re completely within your rights to be upset, and I’m sorry that she put you in that position. I was in the same position as you earlier in the month and I know the awful feeling of other people’s reactions after you’ve been on a spree of binging. I’m sorry ♥️ sending you hope and positivity that I hope you can find in the world around you (hopefully that doesn’t sound disingenuous because I do mean it!)
